languages.text: {n}Воин буравит вас взглядом нечеловеческих глаз.{/n} "Я — владыка тех, кто пал от твоей руки в чертогах Истины Изначальной. Имя мне — Уралон Жестокий. Души моих последователей вернулись в лоно стихии, коей служили они, и возопили о том, дабы я обратил свой взор на свершенное святотатство. И что же вижу я? Очередной слуга трупа на троне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Воин буравит вас взглядом нечеловеческих глаз.{/n} "Я — владыка тех, кто пал от твоей руки в чертогах Истины Изначальной. Имя мне — {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Темный апостол{/g} Уралон Жестокий. Души моих последователей вернулись в лоно стихии, коей служили они, и возопили о том, дабы я обратил свой взор на свершенное святотатство. И что же вижу я? Очередной слуга трупа на троне".

languages.text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."
languages.original_text: {n}Воин буравит вас взглядом нечеловеческих глаз.{/n} "Я — владыка тех, кто пал от твоей руки в чертогах Истины Изначальной. Имя мне — Уралон Жестокий. Души моих последователей вернулись в лоно стихии, коей служили они, и возопили о том, дабы я обратил свой взор на свершенное святотатство. И что же вижу я? Очередной слуга трупа на троне".

traits.locale_text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers have returned to the bosom of the power that they served and cried out so that I would cast my gaze over the sacrilege committed. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

languages.text: {n}Los ojos inhumanos del guerrero te atraviesan.{/n} «Soy el amo de aquellos a quienes has abatido en los salones de la Verdad Primordial. Soy el Uralon el Cruel. Las almas de mis seguidores regresaron a la fuente del poder al que servían, clamando para que dirigiera mi mirada hacia este sacrilegio. ¿Y qué veo? Más lacayos del emperador cadáver».
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos inhumanos del guerrero te atraviesan.{/n} «Soy el amo de aquellos a quienes has abatido en los salones de la Verdad Primordial. Soy el {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Apóstol Oscuro{/g} Uralon el Cruel. Las almas de mis seguidores regresaron a la fuente del poder al que servían, clamando para que dirigiera mi mirada hacia este sacrilegio. ¿Y qué veo? Más lacayos del emperador cadáver».

languages.text: {n}戦士の人間離れした目がこちらを見つめる。{/n}「我は原初の真実の広間でお前の手によって倒された者たちの主だ。名は残酷なウラロン。我が従者たちの魂は、彼らが仕えていた力の泉に戻り、この冒涜を見よと我に泣き叫んでいる。それゆえに見に来てみたらなんてことない、またもや死体の皇帝の手下ではないか」
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}戦士の人間離れした目がこちらを見つめる。{/n}「我は原初の真実の広間でお前の手によって倒された者たちの主だ。名は残酷なウラロン。我が従者たちの魂は、彼らが仕えていた力の泉に戻り、この冒涜を見よと我に泣き叫んでいる。それゆえに見に来てみたらなんてことない、またもや死体の皇帝の手下ではないか」

languages.text: {n}面前的战士以非人的双眼死死地盯着你。{/n}“你在原初真理大厅杀害了我的仆人，我是他们的主人残暴者乌拉隆。那些追随者的灵魂，已经回归了他们所侍奉的力量之源，他们的哭喊声让我看到了这样的亵渎之举。我看到了什么呢？不过又是尸皇的走狗罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}面前的战士以非人的双眼死死地盯着你。{/n}“你在原初真理大厅杀害了我的仆人，我是他们的主人，{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}黑暗使徒{/g}残暴者乌拉隆。那些追随者的灵魂，已经回归了他们所侍奉的力量之源，他们的哭喊声让我看到了这样的亵渎之举。我看到了什么呢？不过又是尸皇的走狗罢了。”

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier vous transperce du regard de ses yeux non-humains.{/n} « Je suis le maître de ceux qui ont péri de votre main dans les salles de la Vérité Primordiale. Je suis Uralon le Cruel. Les âmes de mes disciples sont revenues à la source du pouvoir qu'elles servaient, me suppliant de constater ce sacrilège. Et que vois-je ? Encore {mf|un laquais|une servante} de l'Empereur-Cadavre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier vous transperce du regard de ses yeux inhumains.{/n} « Je suis le maître de ceux qui ont péri de votre main dans les salles de la Vérité Primordiale. Je suis Uralon le Cruel, l'{g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Apôtre Noir{/g}. Les âmes de mes disciples sont revenues à la source du pouvoir qu'elles servaient, me suppliant de constater ce sacrilège. Et que vois-je ? Encore {mf|un laquais|une servante} de l'Empereur-Cadavre. »

languages.text: {n}Die unmenschlichen Augen des Kriegers bohren sich in dich hinein.{/n} "Ich bin der Meister jener, die in den Hallen der Primordialen Wahrheit durch Eure Hand gefallen sind. Ich bin Uralon der Grausame. Die Seelen meiner Anhänger sind in den Quell der Macht zurückgekehrt, der sie dienten. Sie forderten schreiend, dass ich meinen Blick auf dieses Sakrileg richte. Und was sehe ich? Einen weiteren Lakaien des Leichenimperators."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die unmenschlichen Augen des Kriegers bohren sich in dich hinein.{/n} "Ich bin der Meister jener, die in den Hallen der Primordialen Wahrheit durch Eure Hand gefallen sind. Ich bin der {g|Encyclopedia:DarkApostle}Dunkle Apostel{/g} Uralon der Grausame. Die Seelen meiner Anhänger sind in den Quell der Macht zurückgekehrt, der sie dienten. Sie forderten schreiend, dass ich meinen Blick auf dieses Sakrileg richte. Und was sehe ich? Einen weiteren Lakaien des Leichen-Imperators."

languages.text: {n}Savaşçı, insan dışı gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Ezelî Hakikat'in dehlizlerinde canını aldıklarının efendisiyim. Adım Zalim Uralon'dur. Müritlerimin ruhları, hizmet ettikleri kudret pınarına geri döndü, bu hürmetsizliğe dur demem için feryat etti. Peki karşıma ne çıksa beğenirsin? Ceset imparatorun bir başka uşağı."
languages.original_text: {n}The warrior's inhuman eyes bore into you.{/n} "I am the master of those who have been felled by your hand in the halls of the Primordial Truth. I am Uralon the Cruel. The souls of my followers returned to the fount of power they served, crying out for me to cast my gaze toward this sacrilege. And what do I see? Yet another lackey of the corpse emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçı, insan dışı gözlerini sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Ezelî Hakikat’in dehlizlerinde canını aldıklarının efendisiyim ben. Adım Zalim Uralon’dur. Müritlerimin ruhları, hizmet ettikleri kudret pınarına geri döndü ve bu kâfirliğe dur demem için feryat etti. Ama karşıma ne çıksa beğenirsin? Ceset imparatorun ayak takımından biri daha."
